triggeredRules.explanation: Challan CH-SR03-20250105-009 shows amount overwriting  physical challan reads 4.50L but CFMS confirms original amount 45K. 4.05L discrepancy indicates intentional defacement.

challanTimeline.detail: Original challan generated for 45,000  Sale Deed stamp duty
Treasury deposit confirmed for 45,000
Registration proceeded with challan showing 4,50,000  amount overwritten from 45K to 4.5L
CFMS sync detected mismatch  original challan 45K vs presented amount 4.5L

failedChallanEvidence.failureReason: Physical challan shows amount overwriting  original 45,000 altered to 4,50,000 by adding a zero. CFMS-synced record confirms original amount as 45,000. Ink analysis indicates secondary handwriting on amount field.

notes.author: System
notes.note: Critical: CFMS cross-verification detected defaced challan CH-SR03-20250105-009. Physical challan presented during registration shows 4,50,000 but CFMS treasury record confirms original deposit of only 45,000. Amount overwriting detected  the trailing zero appears to have been added post-issuance. Revenue at risk: 4,05,000.

activityLog.detail: Auto-detected by rule R-CR-007: Defaced challan CH-SR03-20250105-009  amount overwriting detected via CFMS cross-verification
Investigating defaced challan  requesting physical challan from SRO for forensic examination
